Text: thanks for the up, but that is a huge 14.5GB download. Has anyone seen season 3 re-encoded to more manageable size?

why complain about the size? I download at night I got it by morning with cable.
can we get 1080p? this show deserves it,what with all the small detail of the armys.
this is onea the best shows of all time.quite possibly THE MOST exciting show of all time.
Such irony... the Confederate Army Release Group uploads a show about slaves fighting for freedom...
